title: Highlight what’s important with visual effects
desc: Apply amazing parallax effects, section particles, element satellites, to highlight your ideas, or use tooltips to mark what’s most important

title: Make your content stand out with popups
desc: Use JetPopup to build effective popup templates with dynamic content, complex conditions and versatile trigger events

title: Build effective booking forms with dynamic content
desc: Create advanced booking forms with dynamic field values, calculated fields and multiple integration options with JetEngine

title: Use super fast search with results preview
desc: JetSearch plugin makes the search work without refreshing the page, and the results can be displayed based on relevance

title: Style up your content with 100+ widgets
desc: Enjoy using multiple static and dynamic widgets for showcasing any content of your choice, providing a fast way to build any page

title: Create WooCommerce pages easily
desc: Use JetWooBuilder in sync with WooCommerce, JetProductGallery, and JetCompareWishlist to build product and archive page templates

title: Filter publications faster and smarter
desc: Filter publications and products without preloading, using multiple filters that are based on taxonomy, meta field or date

title: Combine multiple query methods
desc: With Jet plugins, you’d be able to use several queries to apply to publications, showcased with JetBlog and JetEngine

title: Build custom archive and single page templates
desc: With the widgets for dynamic content, you can easily create any template that literally pulls all the needed information form your posts

title: Enjoy creating custom headers and footers
desc: Crocoblock will assist you in creating beautiful header and footer templates with login forms, mega menu, and other must-have elements
